translations: v.重视，珍视；珍爱，爱护；抱有（信念、希望）；怀有（好感）；怀念（cherish 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He genuinely loved and cherished her.
He described the picture as his most cherished possession.
sentences.translation: 他说这张照片是他最珍爱的财产。

sentences.sentence: In the last 30 years many cherished values have bitten the dust.
sentences.translation: 过去30年里许多值得珍惜的价值观已经不复存在。
